mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_admin (username, password, nickname, phone, email, description, enable) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{description}, #{enable})
mapper.select: select ta.id, ta.username, ta.password, ta.enable, tp.value from tp_admin ta left join tp_admin_role tar on ta.id = tar.admin_id left join tp_role_permission trp on tar.role_id = trp.role_id left join tp_permission tp on trp.permission_id = tp.id where ta.username = #{username};

sql.if: id, username, password, nickname, phone, email, enable
